sourcesContent:
Add New Product

  • {{ product.name }}

    {{ product.description }}

import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; type Products = { name: string; description: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'], }) export class ProductsComponent { // products!: Products[] | []; displayAddProductModal: boolean = false; products = [ { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" } ] // show 'add product' modal addNewProduct(){ this.displayAddProductModal = true } // close 'add product' modal from child component onAddProductModal(){ this.displayAddProductModal = false } }
